trans-unit.source: The base class for a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 異動的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Commits the database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 認可資料庫交易。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定與交易關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 與交易相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple data source connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: 單一應用程式可能有多個資料來源連接，各有零個或多個交易。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您判斷特定交易相關聯的連接物件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定與交易關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 與交易相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple data source connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: 單一應用程式可能有多個資料來源連接，各有零個或多個交易。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您判斷特定交易相關聯的連接物件。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> should rollback the transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> 應該回復交易。

trans-unit.source: However, the behavior of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> is provider specific, and should not replace calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，行為<xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A>提供者特有的且應該不會取代呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放由 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> 使用的 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> should rollback the transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> 應該回復交易。

trans-unit.source: However, the behavior of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> is provider specific, and should not replace calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，行為<xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A>提供者特有的且應該不會取代呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> references.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" />，則這個方法會釋放這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> 參考之任何 Managed 物件所持有的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> should rollback the transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> 應該回復交易。

trans-unit.source: However, the behavior of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> is provider specific, and should not replace calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，行為<xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A>提供者特有的且應該不會取代呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定適用於此交易的 <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: 適用於此交易的 <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" />。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.
trans-unit.target: 從暫止狀態復原交易。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction, or a null reference if the transaction is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得與交易相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 物件，如果交易已不再有效，則為 Null 參考。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 與交易相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 物件。
